abstract: Bank of America has hired yet another big law firm, this time Paul, Weiss, Rifkind, Wharton & Garrison, to handle civil litigation tied to its shotgun marriage to Merrill Lynch.
snippet: Bank of America has hired yet another big law firm, this time Paul, Weiss, Rifkind, Wharton & Garrison, to handle civil litigation tied to its shotgun marriage to Merrill Lynch.
lead_paragraph: As Bank of America continues to grapple with the headaches associated with its Merrill Lynch deal last year, the banking giant has added another set of players to its legal defense team.

headline.main: Bank of America Hires Paul Weiss for S.E.C. Litigation

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced and Eric Dash

abstract: Bank of America’s board voted to reveal the legal counsel that it received about its merger with Merrill Lynch.
snippet: Bank of America’s board voted to reveal the legal counsel that it received about its merger with Merrill Lynch.
lead_paragraph: Facing mounting pressure from multiple investigations, Bank of America’s board has voted to reveal the legal advice that the bank received late last year in its merger with Merrill Lynch.

headline.main: Deal Advice on Merrill Will Be Aired
headline.print_headline: Bank of America Set to Reveal Merrill Consultations

byline.original: By Louise Story and Eric Dash
